Diagnosis.Comment: Patient failed the AD8 and MSME partial test, There is significant cognitive decline and there is probable cognitive impairment, please proceed to use Aid for Dementia Diagnosis for a detailed assessment
Diagnosis.Header: Sig. Cognitive Decline, Probable Cognitive Impairment

Diagnosis.Comment: The development of an effective brief dementia test will help in the early identification of dementia. ~~Aim: This study investigates the diagnostic utility of a brief cognitive test for dementia which combines a short subjective informant-rated questionnaire (AD8) with an objective cognitive measure (Mini-Mental State Examination, MMSE) or its subcomponents.
Diagnosis.Header: A Brief Dementia Test with Subjective and Objective Measures

Diagnosis.Comment: Patient have passed the assessment, he/she is unlikely to have any form of cognitive impairment
